CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: BrightSphere Investment Group Inc is a diversified multi-boutique asset management company. The companys diverse affiliates offer alpha-generating investment products to investors around the world. Its reportable segment includes Quant and Solutions which comprises of versatile tailored strategies that leverage data and technology in a computational factor-based investment process across a range of asset classes in developed and emerging markets including non-U.S. and small-cap equities as well as managed volatility ESG multi-asset equity alternatives and long/short strategies Its affiliates offer products in the U.S international and emerging markets equities; U.S. fixed income; and alternative investments including timber and secondary Funds.
